posts.post_title: Rare back Reds team lot , Joss and Lajoie. Hindu,EPDG, Cycles,AB, OM, T....
posts.post_content:
Addie Joss pitching Polar Bear SGC 3  $375
Nap Lajoie  throwing SC 350 30 Fresh slab PSA 2 $500


Reds offback team lot. Id rather keep this together. This is a complete team lot minus Spade and Downey batting, both EPDG which are at PSA. They are obviously not included with this sale, because i dont have them back yet, but I'll be happy to offer them to the buyer of this lot once they are processed. 
Cards included in this Reds team lot are:

Bescher portrait Polar Bear PSA 2
Bescher hands in air Sovereign 460 PSA 2
Campbell Sovereign 350 PSA 4 mk
Downey fielding American Beauty PSA 2  *from Hall collection 
Dubuc Sovereign 350 raw, pr
Egan Old Mill PSA 3
Ewing Sweet Caporal 150 PSA 4
Fromme Old Mill PSA 4
Gasper Cycle 350 PSA 1.5 * Hall collection 
Griffith batting Old Mill SGC 4
Griffith portrait Hindu SGC 1
Hoblitzell Cycle 350 PSA 3 *Hall collection 
Huggins portrait Cycle 350 PSA 4
Huggins hands at mouth American Beauty PSA 3
Karger Sweet Caporal 150 PSA 4
Lobert Piedmont 150 Raw, EX oc
Mclean Polar Bear raw, pr
Mitchell Tolstoi PSA 3 * Hall collection 
Mowrey Piedmont 350 PSA 4
Oakes EPDG PSA 2.5
Paskert Sovereign SGC 1.5

 21 total cards. Quite a few are VERY low pop. Guessing individual value would be around 3700. Selling lot for 2900 net which includes shipping with tracking. Reds lot has sold.
 Please email questions to me at norwoodclassicsATgmail.com
Ill be happy to send scans to interested parties.
Thank you for all the interest! I plan to answer emails in the order received this evening.
I believe I've answered all emails. I also have a WaJo Old Mill ill be posting in a separate ad. Hopefully i can figure how to attach pics to it  lol
One more email coming your way- Trent King
I sent a pm and also sent an email, thanks - Joe
Reds lot has sold. Joss and Lajoie still available, at this moment.
